name: YMGYPBVF: You Must Gather Your Party Before Venturing Forth
name_original: YMGYPBVF: You Must Gather Your Party Before Venturing Forth
description:
This is a puzzle game where you need to keep all of your adventuring party alive to the exit.  Pressing a direction will cause your currently selected character slide that way until they hit a wall, a comrade, or get killed.

Controls:

WASD/Cursors to move

Space to swap character

Escape to restart the level
